mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mes.productinfo(id, packId, spec, productTypeId, shopsign, quantity, qualityGradeName, confirmDate, machineId, productTypeName, packingTypeId, factoryProductid, unitedPackId, partId, putinWeight, mwrapid, confirmPerson, grossWeight, netWeight, deep, width, length) VALUES (#{id}, #{packId}, #{spec}, #{productTypeId}, #{shopsign}, #{quantity}, #{qualityGradeNam}, #{confirmDate}, #{machineId}, #{productTypeName}, #{packingTypeId}, #{factoryProductid}, #{unitedPackId}, #{partId}, #{putinWeight}, #{mwrapid}, #{confirmPerson}, #{grossWeight}, #{netWeight}, #{deep}, #{width}, #{length});
mapper.update: UPDATE productinfo SET packId = #{packId}, spec = #{spec}, productTypeId = #{productTypeId}, shopsign = #{shopsign}, quantity = #{quantity}, qualityGradeName = #{qualityGradeNam}, confirmDate = #{confirmDate}, machineId = #{machineId}, productTypeName = #{productTypeName}, packingTypeId = #{packingTypeId}, factoryProductid = #{factoryProductid}, unitedPackId = #{unitedPackId}, putinWeight = #{putinWeight}, mwrapid = #{mwrapid}, confirmPerson = #{confirmPerson} WHERE partId = #{partId}
